otherFeatureRow1Col1Content: Add or select from recommended categories that match item’s characteristics.
otherFeatureRow1Col2Content: Register new items by scanning or create one on the spot.
otherFeatureRow1Col3Content: Upload item photos for enhanced visualization.
otherFeatureRow1Col4Content: Upload your inventory Excel sheet for item registration.
otherFeatureRow2Col1Content: Easily make stock in and out with your smartphone scanner.
otherFeatureRow2Col2Content: Manage supplier/vendor information to make accurate transactions.
otherFeatureRow2Col3Content: Search your teammates' transactions by various sorting options.
otherFeatureRow2Col4Content: Add past transactions by importing Excel sheets or export all transactions to a file.
otherFeatureRow2Col5Content: Draft and print an invoice with your transaction.
otherFeatureRow3Col1Content: Search or filter items by categories to check status.
otherFeatureRow3Col2Content: Scan barcodes with a smartphone camera to immediately view status.
otherFeatureRow3Col3Content: Check changes in item’s inventory balance.
otherFeatureRow3Col4Content: Variety of useful functions for improved decision-making.
otherFeatureRow3Col5Content: Analyze your inventory’s performance with various analytic tools.
otherFeaturesDesc:
Divided by Item Register, Stock In & Out, and Stock Control,
all the key features for efficient management are provided.
otherFeaturesDescMobile: Divided by Item Register, Stock In & Out, and Stock Control, all the key features for efficient management are provided.
pageDescription: The easiest inventory management app on earth. Stock in & out your items in just one touch of BoxHero’s mobile app scanner.
pageTitle: Why is BoxHero the Best in Inventory Management

BoxHero's simplicity and convenience is
perfect for first-time users to start managing their
inventory.
